q.quote: If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.
q.author: Andy Rooney

q.quote: My livelihood depends on the art of animators.
q.author: Andy Serkis

q.quote: Greed is not a financial issue. It's a heart issue.
q.author: Andy Stanley

q.quote: If you're not trying to be real, you don't have to get it right. That's art.
q.author: Andy Warhol

q.quote: The purpose of getting power is to be able to give it away.
q.author: Aneurin Bevan

q.quote: Radical simply means 'grasping things at the root.'
q.author: Angela Davis

q.quote: I was 16 when I entered the foster system, and know firsthand the statistics for 'aging out.'
q.author: Angela Featherstone

q.quote: When it comes to human dignity, we cannot make compromises.
q.author: Angela Merkel

q.quote: When other little girls wanted to be ballet dancers I kind of wanted to be a vampire.
q.author: Angelina Jolie

q.quote: If you like it, let it be, and if you don't please do the same.
q.author: Ani DiFranco

q.quote: If we took away women's right to vote, we'd never have to worry about another Democrat president.
q.author: Ann Coulter

q.quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
q.author: Ann Landers

q.quote: I've always said that in politics, your enemies can't hurt you, but your friends will kill you.
q.author: Ann Richards

q.quote: When grief is deepest, words are fewest.
q.author: Ann Voskamp

q.quote: My different personalities leave me in peace now.
q.author: Anna Freud
